alert.note: Alert for Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 8:19AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota...Minnesota... James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River near Mitchell affecting Hanson and Davison Counties. Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. West Fork Des Moines River near Avoca affecting Murray and Cottonwood Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa... Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Brookings and Moody Counties. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. Big Sioux River near Trent affecting Moody County. Big Sioux River near Egan affecting Moody County. Big Sioux River near Richland affecting Union and Plymouth Counties. Big Sioux River at Brandon affecting Lyon, Minnehaha and Lincoln Counties. Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Hamlin and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. Big Sioux River at Akron affecting Union and Plymouth Counties. Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Union, Sioux and Lincoln Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Big Sioux River near Egan. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1516.5 feet, flooding begins to affect agricultural lands around Egan. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 1516.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM CDT Sunday was 1517.0 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1516.5 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Big Sioux River Egan 1516.5 1516.8 Sun 9 am MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning by around 1100 AM CDT.
